attributes.action: Give his personal assurance that the Email addresses and personal details of all those who signed the road pricing petition and any other petition critical of the government are not passed to any other governmant agency such as the police or the security services and that the information will not be used for any purpose other than in connection with any response to the road pricing petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
